[ ](/store/p/membership-platinum) [ ](/store/p/membership-platinum)

$1,000.00 

[ ](/store/p/membership-youth) [ ](/store/p/membership-youth)

$20.00 

#### **MEMBERSHIP BENEFITS**

As a member, you are more than just a supporter – you are part of our creative community, helping us bring bold exhibitions, hands-on programs, and unforgettable experiences to life. From one-of-a-kind artist exhibits to interesting lectures and Art Talks, your membership makes it all possible.

**Here’s what we’ve been up to in 2024:**

  * 10 Artist Receptions

  * 12 Community Partnerships

  * 2 Student Art Shows (with cash awards)

  * 1 Writing Contest (with cash awards)

  * 3 Art Talks

  * 1 Artist Workshop

  * Cherry Blossom Festival participant

  * 3 Book Talks

  * 1st Annual Mother’s Day Brunch Fundraiser

  * Juneteenth Celebration Brunch

  * GumTree Art Gala

In 2025, we are debuting our Annual Members’ Art Show, where any member of the Museum (18+) is able to show off their creations and have a chance to be win the Members’ Choice Award - $500 cash prize! This award will be voted upon by members of the Museum.

An additional perk that you will receive at t...

_The GumTree Museum of Art features exhibits, workshops, Art Talks and special events year-round. In addition to high-quality exhibitions, the Museum highlights two student art shows each spring. All exhibitions are free and the public is invited to attend._

_GMA is a 501(c)(3) organization._

#### The perfect space for your next event!
